name: AutoWar Rise Of The Bots
description:
A strategy game where you can give direct order to your units in addition to program them using a simple flow chart.

Feel free to create your own AI and assign it to any unit you want  through the strategy editor (¬‿¬)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

IMPORTANT NOTES

THIS GAME WAS DESIGNED FOR LEARNING PURPOSES ONLY, ITS NERVE MEANT TO BE A COMMERCIAL GAME "I would like to make a commercial one in the future but in deferent design".

ALL THE MODELS WERE DOWNLOADED FOR FREE AND BELONG TO THEIR RESPECTIVE OWNERS.

MAIN MENU SOUNDTRACK IS FOR ITS COMPOSER ZACK HEMSEY. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

GAME CONTROLS

  • Moving camera by W, A, S, D
  • Shift for camera sprint.
  • Rotating camera by E, Q
  • Select and unselect units by left mouse button.
  • Giving order by right mouse button.
  • CTRL to open base building queue and units' strategy assigner.
  • ESC  close any window :)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I'll  be glad for any notes and improvements to add to the game.

I'm not a DESIGNER I'm just a programmer "AI student" who want to make games, so any help or cooperation are welcomed.
